title: New KDP Rocket Update 1.0.27 Video
description:
KDP Rocket just got even better with two new updates that will help you find better keywords and fast.  Here they are:

1. Better method of finding suggested keywords using Amazon even more than before.
2. In the competition search, KDP Rocket now shows you all of the categories those competitors are ranking for in one nice little box. 
3. Exporting of data can't be done till the data has fully loaded.

Enjoy the new features and better results!  And we'll keep working to make KDP Rocket even better!

Buy KDP Rocket here: https://publisherrocket.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social&utm_term=kdp-rocket-1.0.27&utm_content=&utm_campaign=publisher-rocket
